entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
